channel.title: Milestones & Due Dates on FEWD
channel.description: Recent content in Milestones & Due Dates on FEWD

item.title: Submit Project Ideas
item.description: Milestone I: Submit Project Ideas Submit a least 3 ideas for your final project Deliverable: Use this form to submit your final project ideas Due Date: Monday, April 15th After which, I’ll schedule some time to meet with you to discuss your ideas

item.title: Get Idea Approved
item.description: Milestone II: Get Final Project Idea Approved Details TBD Due Date: Monday, April 22nd

item.title: Create Github Repository for Final Project
item.description: Milestone III: Create Github Repository for Final Project Details TBD Due Date: Wednesday, April 24th Do not include spaces in your github repository names - **Deliverable**: Submit a link to your github repo here --

item.title: Create & Submit Wireframes
item.description: Milestone IV: Create and Submit Wireframes Details TBD Due Date: Monday, April 29nd

item.title: Create Project Plan
item.description: Milestone V: Create Project Plan Details TBD Due Date: Monday, April 29th Trello is a free project management tool that uses the kanban approach to track tasks - You will share (i.e. add us as team members) your trello board with the instruction team - **Deliverable**: Provide link to your Trello board here --

item.title: Host Final Project using Github Pages
item.description: Milestone VI: Host Final Project using Github Pages Details TBD Due Date: Monday, May 13th

item.title: Submit Final Project
item.description: Milestone VII: Submit Final Project Details TBD Due Date: Monday, May 20th
